scripts.build-transform-global: pnpm dlx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/global.json global
scripts.build-transform-light: pnpm dlx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/light.json global,light,theme global
scripts.build-transform-dark: pnpm dlx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/dark.json global,dark,theme global
scripts.build-transform: pnpm run build-transform-global && pnpm run build-transform-light && pnpm run build-transform-dark
scripts.build-token: pnpm run build-transform && pnpm run build-sd && pnpm run build-tw
